CustomField.formula: IF( RecordType_Name__c= 'TAD' && ordexp_departure_date__r.HSS__c =true , ordexp_departure_date__r.HSS_amount__c , 0) + IF( RecordType_Name__c= 'TNZ' && ordexp_departure_date__r.HSS_nz__c=true , ordexp_departure_date__r.HSS_amount_nz__c, 0)+IF( RecordType_Name__c= 'TC' && ordexp_departure_date__r.HSS__c =true , ordexp_departure_date__r.HSS_amount__c , 0) + IF( RecordType_Name__c= 'WT' && ordexp_departure_date__r.HSS_nz__c=true , ordexp_departure_date__r.HSS_amount_nz__c, 0)
CustomField.label: HSS Amount
